actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make it clear that social security benefits are and will continue to be exempt from all taxation.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the taxation of any title II benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make it clear that social security benefits are and will continue to be exempt from all taxation.
